feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-20T10:02:10.162315Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;凯文·米特尼克去世</stitle>; <id>;https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/las-vegas-nv/kevin-mitnick-11371668</id>; <更新>; 2023-07-20T00：01：26.812533Z </更新>; <link href =“https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/las-vegas-nv/kevin-mitnick-11371668”/>; <作者>; <名称>;三十七</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thirtyseven</uri>; </作者>; <内容type="html">;<img src="https://d3eguztg5751m.cloudfront.net/as/assets-mem-com/cmi/8/6/6/1/11371668/20230719_173037764_0_orig.jpg/-/kevin-mitnick-las-vegas-nv-obituary.jpg?crop=%28171.58333 333333331%2C0%2C544.9583333333333%2C464%29&cropxunits=696&cropyunits=464&maxheight=650" style="宽度：220px;身高：274px;" />;<br />;著名黑客和网络安全专家凯文·米特尼克 (Kevin Mitnick) 在与胰腺癌作斗争后于 59 岁去世。他留下了怀着第一个孩子的妻子金伯利·米特尼克 (Kimberley Mitnick)。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#kevin-mitnick-has-died" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycomb inator.com/item?id=36795173" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MDN Playground</stitle>; <id>;https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/play</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T09:01:26 .922813Z</updated>; <link href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/play"/>; <作者>; <name>;weinzierl</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=weinzierl</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://developer.mozilla.org/mdn-social-share.cd6c4a5a.png" style="width: 220 像素； height: 124px;" />;<br />;MDN Web 文档站点提供有关开放 Web 技术的信息，包括适用于网站和渐进式 Web 应用程序的 HTML、CSS 和 API。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mdn-playground" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36798157" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN: Twenty.com (YC S23) – 开源 CRM</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36791434</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T19:01 :26.924651Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36791434"/>; <author>; <name>;iFelix</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=iFelix</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Twenty 是一款开源 CRM，旨在通过提供出色的用户体验和服务来解决现有 CRM 的问题满足小公司的需求，他们计划未来重点发展三大功能，并通过提供托管版本来赚钱。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-twenty-com-yc-s23-open-source-crm" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36791434" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernew s.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;源于葡萄牙语的日语单词</stitle>; <id>;https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glossary_of_Japan_words_of_Portuguese_origin</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T04:01:26.925471Z</updated>; <link href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glossary_of_Japan_ Words_of_Portuguese_origin"/>; <author>; <name>;lermontov</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lermontov</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;室町时代，葡萄牙耶稣会牧师将基督教思想、西方科学、技术和新产品引入日本，许多源自葡萄牙的日语单词进入了日语。葡萄牙人是第一个将日语翻译成西方语言的《日葡词典》，该词典解释了翻译成葡萄牙语的 32,000 个日语单词。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#japanese-words-of-portuguese-origin" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36778309" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;斯坦福大学校长因操纵研究而辞职，将撤回 3 篇论文</stitle>; <id>;https://stanforddaily.com/2023/07/19/stanford-president-resigns-over-manipulated-research-will-retract-at-least-3-papers/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T18:01:26.927717Z</update d>; <link href="https://stanforddaily.com/2023/07/19/stanford-president-resigns-over-manipulated-research-will-retract-at-least-3-papers/"/>; <作者>; <name>;dralley</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dralley</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://stanforddaily。 com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/2023.02.07_MTL-Departing-4.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;根据斯坦福大学周三上午发布的消息，斯坦福大学校长 Marc Tessier-Lavigne 将于 8 月 31 日辞职。在斯坦福大学资助的一项调查发现“研究数据被操纵”后，他还将撤回或对他作为主要作者的五篇被广泛引用的论文进行冗长更正。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stanford-president-resigns-over-manipulated-research-will-retract-3-papers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36790301" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;爆米花聚合物的危险：TPC 集团化工厂事件 [视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6-3BFXpBcjc</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T00:01:26.928436Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/ watch?v=6-3BFXpBcjc"/>; <author>; <name>;oatmeal1</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=oatmeal1</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/6-3BFXpBcjc"frameborder="0"allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hacker news.betacat.io/#the-danger-of-popcorn-polymer-incident-at-the-tpc-group-chemical-plant-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36794756" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;昆加：古代美索不达米亚人创造了世界上第一个杂交动物</stitle>; <id>;https://bigthink.com/the-past/kunga-first-hybrid-animal/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T06:01:26.929159Z</updated>; <link href="https://bigthink.com/the-past/kunga-first- Hybrid-animal/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;diodorus</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=diodorus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://bigthink.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/kunga.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：124px;" />;<br />;昆加马科动物，被称为人类最早的驮兽之一，可能是最早的人造杂交动物。DNA研究表明，昆加马是由家驴与雄性半兽杂交创造的。昆加马的力量和多才多艺使其成为古代美索不达米亚的宝贵财富，但其数量随着家马的引入而减少。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ #kunga-ancient-mesopotamians-created-the-worlds-first-hybrid-animal" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36777096" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;人工智能研究人员的开源学习曲线</stitle>; <id>;https://www.supervised.news/p/the-open-source-learning-curve-for</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T22:01:26.929926Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.supervised.news/p/the-open-source-learning-curve-for"/>; <author>; <name>;bobvan luijt</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bobvanluijt</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic %2Fimages%2Fde934ee0-3e58-4043-8ae1-b437f240a847_1024x1024.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Tri Dao 是 Fl​​ashAttention（一种语言模型开发技术）的创建者，正面临着与快节奏的 LLM 开源社区合作的挑战。Dao 加入了专注于构建开源语言模型的初创公司 Together，以应对这一挑战。FlashAttention-2 可以加快 LLM 的训练和微调，有助于使大型语言模型在用例中更加实用。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the -open-source-learning-curve-for-ai-researchers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36793881" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Yelp 重建损坏的 Cas使用数据流架构的 sandra 集群</stitle>; <id>;https://www.infoq.com/news/2023/07/yelp-corrupted-cassandra-rebuild/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T02:01:26.931321Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.infoq.com/news/2023/07/yelp-corrupted-cassandra-re build/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rgancarz </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rgancarz</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://imgopt.infoq.com/fit-in/1200x2400/filters:quality(80)/filters:no_upscale()/news/2023/07/yelp-corrupted-cas sandra-rebuild/en/resources/1mitigation-strategy-1689337695832.jpeg" style="width: 220px; height: 138px;" />;<br />;Yelp 使用其数据流架构重建了损坏的 Cassandra 集群。他们创建了一个数据管道来清理数据并删除损坏的记录，最终将数据移动到新集群中。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#yelp-rebuilds-corrupted-cassandra-cluster-using-its-data-streaming-architecture" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36771331" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;LinkedIn 采用协议缓冲区并将延迟降低高达 60%</stitle>; <id>;https://www.infoq.com/news/2023/0 7/linkedin-protocol-buffers-restli/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T23:01:26.932840Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.infoq.com/news/2023/07/linkedin-protocol-buffers-restli/"/>; <author>; <name>;ijidak</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= ijidak</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://imgopt.infoq.com/fit-in/1200x2400/filters:quality(80)/filters:no_upscale()/news/2023/07/linkedin-protocol-buffers-restli/en/resources/1RestLiClientServerFlow-1689612288438.jpeg"样式=“宽度：220px； height: 115px;" />;<br />;LinkedIn 采用 Protocol Buffers 在其平台上更高效地在微服务之间交换数据，并将其与开源 REST 框架 Rest.li 集成。在全公司范围内推广后，他们将延迟降低了 60%，同时提高了资源利用率。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#linkedin-adopts-protocol-buffers-and-reduces-latency-up- to-60" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36794430" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;悼念：Hans Petter William Sirevåg Selasky</stitle >; <id>;https://lists.freebsd.org/archives/freebsd-announce/2023-July/000076.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T06:01:26.934293Z</更新>; <link href="https://lists.freebsd.org/archives/freebsd-announce/2023-July/000 076.html"/>; <author>; <name>;stargrave</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=stargrave</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;来自：Sergio Carlavilla <carlavilla_at_freebsd.org>;日期：2023 年 7 月 20 日星期四 03:58:14 UTC <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#in-memoriam-hans-petter-william-sirevag-selasky" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36797178" target="_blank">;[com ments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;CPU 上的 Minigpt4 推理</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/Maknee/minigpt4.cpp</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T06:01:26.934983Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/minigpt4.cpp" com/Maknee/minigpt4.cpp"/>; <author>; <name>;maknee</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=maknee</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Maknee/minigpt4.cpp/master/assets/webui_demo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 10 3像素；” />;<br />;minigpt4.cpp 的主要目标是通过 ggml 库使用 4 位量化来运行 minigpt4。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#minigpt4-inference-on-cpu" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36797079" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;ChatGPT 时代的编程教学</stitle>; <id>;https://www.oreilly.com/radar/teaching-programming-in-the-age-of-chatgpt/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T03:01:26.935659Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.oreilly.com/radar/teaching-programming-in-the-age-of -chatgpt/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;headalgorithm</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=headalgorithm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://d3ansictanv2wj.cloudfront.net/safari-topic-cta-1f60e6f96856da19ba3cb25660472ca5.jpg “样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：128像素；” />;<br />;像 ChatGPT 和 GitHub Copilot 这样的人工智能编码辅助工具正在变得越来越广泛，并且能够解决编程作业问题。教师担心作弊和过度依赖人工智能工具的可能性。他们正在实施课堂考试等策略，并向学生展示人工智能工具的局限性，以防止过度依赖。从长远来看，教师们正在考虑抵制人工智能工具的想法，例如设计防人工智能的作业和评估，以及拥抱人工智能工具的想法，例如为学生未来的工作做好准备，以及使用人工智能工具提供个性化帮助和生成练习问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#teaching-programming-in-the-age-of-chatgpt" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36771114" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Sidebery – 用于管理侧边栏中的选项卡和书签的 Firefox 扩展</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/mbnuqw/sidebery</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T03:01:26.936340Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/mbnuqw/sidebery"/>; <author>; <name>;BafS</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=BafS</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://repository-images.githubusercontent.com/149974867/c9c8b475-64dd-4801-a176-168db0933e8d" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Sidebery 是一个高度可配置的侧边栏，具有不同类型的面板。它具有创建附加档案、安装依赖项以及向项目捐赠等关键功能。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sidebery-a-firefox-extension-for-managing-tabs-and-bookmarks-in-sidebar" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36796422" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml: base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;自 1988 年以来，太空中每 20 分钟就会有一些东西被点亮</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/07/new-slow-repeating-radio-source-we-have-no-idea-what-it-is/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T06:01： 26.937013Z</更新>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/07/new-slow-repeating-radio-source-we-have-no-idea-what-it-is/"/>; <作者>; <name>;Brajeshwar</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Brajeshwar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img s rc =“https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/GettyImages-1291354392-800x523.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px；高度：144px；” />;<br />;研究人员发现了一个新的天体 GPM J1839-10，它每 22 分钟定期发射一次无线电能量。这种行为与已知的脉冲星不同，其背后的物理原理也是未知的。 The object was found during a search for transient objects and has been emitting signals since 1988. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#something-in-space-has-been-lighting-up-every-20-minutes-since-1988" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36797231" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Geothermal Ahead of Schedule</stitle>; <id>;https://twitter.com/TimMLatimer/status/1681304496234991620</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T22:01:26.937677Z</updated>; <link href="https://twitter.com/TimMLatimer/status/1681304496234991620"/>; <author>; <name>;ChuckMcM</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ChuckMcM</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Something went wrong, but don't fret — let's give it another shot. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#geo Thermal-ahead-of-schedule" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36793372" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;在公司中安全使用法学硕士的框架 - 第 1 部分：风险概述</stitle>; <id>;https://boringappsec.substack.com/p/edition-21-a-framework-to-securely</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T21:01:26.938447Z</updated>; <link href="https://boringappsec.substack.com/p/edition-21-a -framework-to-securely"/>; <author>; <name>;sys42590</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sys42590</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsub stack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F88c5b0d4-df8b-4087-9404-4b49f0319565_1024x1024.png" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：220 像素；" />;<br />;在企业中使用法学硕士会带来一些风险，具体取决于它们的部署和使用方式。这篇文章概述了主要风险，并帮助根据组织的用例确定其优先级。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-framework-to-securely-use-llms-in-companies-part-1-overview-of-risks" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36792968" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;什么是无线电频谱？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.transportation.gov/pnt/what-radio-spectrum</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T04:01:26.939126Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.transportation.gov/pnt/what-radio-spectrum"/>; <作者>; <name>;ZunarJ5</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ZunarJ5</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.transportation.gov/sites/dot.gov/files/pictures/Electromagic%20Spectrum%20Cropped%2005082017%200310PM.png" style="width ：220px；高度：144px；” />;<br />;无线电频谱是电磁频谱的一部分，范围从 1 Hz 到 3000 GHz (3 THz)。此频率范围内的电磁波称为无线电波，已广泛应用于现代技术，特别是电信领域。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-is-radio-spectrum" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36782638" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;前端框架的区别</stitle>; <id>;https://themer.dev/blog/the-single-most-important-factor-that- Differentiates-front-end-frameworks</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T20:01:26.940653Z</updated>; <link href="https://themer.dev/blog/the-single-most-important-factor-that- Differentiates-front -end-frameworks"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;变更检测是前端框架的基本功能，框架作者对这一问题的解决方案决定了其他一切。 React 的变更检测范例很简单：应用程序状态在框架内维护，以便 React 知道何时重新渲染。 Angular 通过允许开发人员选择称为 OnPush 的不同策略，提供了摆脱默认更改检测行为的逃生口。 Vue 的更改检测方法略有不同，因为它适用于专门检测的状态对象。 Svelte 的变更检测方法是完全新颖的，因为它在编译时分析组件的代码，并在必要时精确地更新 DOM。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what- Differentiates-front-end-frameworks" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36791506" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;爵士乐演奏（2021）</stitle>; <id>;https://jazz-library.com/articles/comping/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T18:01:26.942045Z</updated>; <link href="https://jazz-library.com/articles/comping/"/>; <author>; <name>;RickHull</name>; <uri>;https://news.y combinator.com/user?id=RickHull</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://jazz-library.com/uploads/featured/_900xAUTO_crop_center-center_none/19591/Electric-Keyboard.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;Comping 是爵士乐合奏团的节奏部分使用的一种爵士乐技术，用于携带和弦变化、应用节奏风格并补充其他演奏旋律的音乐家。它是“伴随”或“补充”的简写。伴奏由节奏部分的和弦乐器演奏，通常是钢琴、风琴或吉他。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#jazz-comping-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36782201" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;语言历史和我们：“喜欢”的案例</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.oup.com/2023/07/language-history-and-we-the-case-of-like/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T04:01:26.942697Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.oup.com/2023/07/language-history-and -we-the-case-of-like/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;赎回</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=redeemed</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://oupblog.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/gardening-g762115135_1280.jpg" style="width: 220 像素；高度：85 像素；" />;<br />;语言变化是一种随着时间的推移而发生的自然现象，不同的人对此有不同的反应。 《Like, Liteally, Dude: Arguing for the Good in Bad English》一书探讨了“like”在现代英语中的使用，但作者关于接受所有语言变化的论点并不能说服我。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#language-history-and-we-the-case-of-like" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36791606" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;当开放变得不透明：开源硬件公司不断变化的面貌</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.adafruit.com/2023/07/12/when-open-becomes-opaque-the-changing-face-of-open-source-hardware-companies/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T15:01:26.943616Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.adafruit.com/2023/07/12/when-open-becomes-opaque-the-changing-face-of-open-source-hardware-companies/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Santosh83</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Santosh83</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn-blog.adafruit. com/uploads/2023/07/changing_face_oshw.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;在过去 15 年多的时间里，开源硬件公司通过设计和发布了数千种开源硬件设计，创造了一个蓬勃发展的行业。然而，一些公司最近关闭了源代码或推迟了文件/源代码的发布，引发了社区对开源未来的担忧。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#when-open-becomes-opaque-the-changing-face-of-open-source-hardware-companies" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36770047" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;2023 年顶级软件趋势报告</stitle>; <id>;http://www.ofbizian.com/2023/07/top-20-must-read-software-reports.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T22:01:26.944345Z</updated>; <link href="http://www .ofbizian.com/2023/07/top-20-must-read-software-reports.html"/>; <author>; <name>;bibryam</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bibryam</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6iuqssxGb38/XK0KquHK8LI /AAAAAAAMig/5G7bZsC9myoJTxok7OddP8KBwCwMg5JHACK4BGAYYCw/s400/kubernetes_patterns.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：283px；" />;<br />;在快速发展的软件行业中，跟上新趋势、工具和最佳实践可能非常耗时。我整理了一份报告列表，提供了从编程语言到 DevOps、云策略和安全性等各个方面的见解。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#top-software-trends-reports-for-2023" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36794025" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
